body:
So today I was planning to announce my YouTube channel opening, but I came across a problem. When I record with Camtasia 2 (demo) the quality is terrible. It's blurry and it's not enjoyable. I've looked up videos for it but couldn't find anything/none of it works. Can anyone help me out por favor?

Thanks

title: Camtasia 2 help

replies.body: If you have a Mac, you should use QuickTime Recorder or Screenflow. You should get Screenflow cracked by uTorrent. If you have any questions about it, add me on Skype BorraMC
replies.body_tagged: If you have a Mac, you should use QuickTime Recorder or Screenflow. You should get Screenflow cracked by uTorrent. If you have any questions about it, add me on Skype BorraMC

replies.body:
Is the preview blurry?
If so, don't use camtasia 2. The camtasia version I have, makes the preview 1080p.
Is the rendered video blurry?
If the rendered video is blurry, you have to change the Custom Render Settings (I think thats what its called). And look uo how to render in 1080p. I can link you to a video on good render settings.
replies.body_tagged:
Is the preview blurry?
If so, don't use camtasia 2. The camtasia version I have, makes the preview 1080p.
Is the rendered video blurry?
If the rendered video is blurry, you have to change the Custom Render Settings (I think thats what its called). And look uo how to render in 1080p. I can link you to a video on good render settings.

replies.body: Get ShadowPlay if you have a computer which is configured for that, if you don't have one, give up.
replies.body_tagged: Get ShadowPlay if you have a computer which is configured for that, if you don't have one, give up.

replies.body: Install razer cortex it boosts your game and you can record game play with it without losing frames also if your in full screen it will record ur face with it :P
